narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This was a focused inspection for the 2.40 (b)(2) "direct" non-compliant item included on the report for the
inspection conducted on July 28, 2014.  The adult tricolor guinea pig identified with an eye condition had been
addressed by a veterinarian.
 
This focused inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors
Hicks Beverly, Animal Care Inspector
